4578_1KbV1e1u6P6AsY8XNBydgtbtN8iSB5WMyG.body: Subgraph is something that has been vapor for years now...I have heard talk that it's possible there will be some integration/collaboration between Subgraph and Qubes though, and for me by far Qubes takes the crown currently as best and most secure OS.   If anything, Subgraph could easily become a layer on top of Qubes, I believe one of the devs of the project suggested that idly somewhere when asked.  Right now though, Qubes works splendidly if you happen to have the hardware for it.
